talk.abstract: In this talk, aimed at novice Python and Django developers, we'll have a look at getting started with testing your Django applications, how to properly write your first test case and then moving to automated testing with Travis CI.
talk.description: In this talk, aimed at novice Python and Django developers, we'll have a look at getting started with testing your Django applications, how to properly write your first test case and then moving to automated testing with Travis CI.
talk.name: Testing Django with Travis CI
talk.title: Testing Django with Travis CI
